document.full_text: the scale of the challenge facing nokia in the all-important smartphones market was underscored on tuesday when a powerful new handset from taiwan's htc overshadowed two new models from the finnish giant.
document.title: htc overshadows nokia at smartphone launches
lines_and_colors: the scale of the challenge facing nokia in the all-important smartphones market was underscored on tuesday when a powerful new handset from taiwan's htc overshadowed two new models from the finnish giant.
